original_text: In this way, God's Holy Spirit was showing that the most holy place was not yet open to everyone. While the tent with its first room was still there, those were the rules for people to worship God.
korean_text: 성령이 이로써 보이신 것은 첫 장막이 서 있을 동안에는 성소에 들어가는 길이 아직 나타나지 아니한 것이라

sentences.original_text: In this way, God's Holy Spirit was showing
that the most holy place was not yet open to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 거룩한 곳은 아직 모든 사람에게 열려있지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: While the tent with its first room was still there
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 방이 있는 장막이 아직 있는 동안에는

sentences.original_text: those were the rules for people to worship God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 사람들이 하나님을 경배하기 위한 규칙이었습니다
